hero.headline: Playful apps that teach — made with heart

about.title: Who we are
about.body: Little Einstein Studio is an independent creative studio co-founded by Osato Kareem and Adetomiwa Adetoro. We focus on playful, research-backed learning apps for kids aged 5–8. Our tools combine colourful art, short animations, and positive reinforcement to help early learners build confidence.

projects.title: Little Einstein — Math Adventure
projects.short: A mobile math game for kids (ages 5–8) focusing on addition and number sense.

projects.title: Alphabet Explorer
projects.short: Interactive mini-games to practice letters, sounds, and tracing.

projects.title: Shapes & Patterns
projects.short: Pattern recognition and spatial reasoning with delightful stickers.
